name: Weathering Soldier
text: If this card is sent to the GY by a card effect, or destroyed by battle: You can add 1 "Fossil Fusion", or 1 card that specifically lists "Fossil Fusion" in its text, from your Deck to your hand, except "Weathering Soldier". You can only use this effect of "Weathering Soldier" once per turn. Once per turn, during your End Phase: This card loses 600 ATK.
